name: Bolchie Run
description:
My first videogame made in Unity during Platzi's course "C# Course for Videogames".
It is a 2D Endless runner platform video game, it is available for Web and PC

During the development of the course I learned:

-Create a controller in 2D.
-Master Unity 2D Animator.
-Create a basic user interface.
-Persistence data
-Import assets
-Create prefabs
-Create animations
-Design scenarios
-Handle switching between scenes in Unity, and master the basics of C#, the Unity programming language.
